item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, January 16, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Gaza ceasefire announced after 15 months of war
2. [Opinion] Britain should stop pretending it wants more economic growth
3. Falling birth rates raise prospect of sharp decline in living standards
4. Short seller Nathan Anderson to shut down Hindenburg Research
5. Wall Street stocks post biggest rally since Trump’s election victory
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, January 16, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
